name: PSL: Pumpkin Spice Latte
preparation:
1. To make simple syrup, boil water, sugar, and Pumpkin Pie Spice in a Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup over high heat for 1 minute, whisking frequently.
  2. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla.
  3. In a large microwave-safe measuring cup, whisk milk with pumpkin. Microwave on high for 1 min, or until mixture starts to bubble.
  4. Using a milk frother or whisk, beat until frothy.
  5. Pour coffee into tumblers or cups. Stir 1â€“2 tsp syrup into each cup. (Refrigerate remaining syrup in a Cruet for another day.) Pour in frothed milk. Dust with more Pumpkin Pie Spice, if desired.
tips: Make it special by adding 1 oz dark rum or Grand Marnier.
